movie.title: The other side of the wall
movie.title_english: The other side of the wall
movie.title_long: The other side of the wall (2017)
movie.description_intro: Ale (18) and Rocio's (13) relationship is faced with the greatest challenge possible when their mother is imprisoned under dubious charges. They have to act as father and mother to their two younger siblings.
movie.description_full: Ale (18) and Rocio's (13) relationship is faced with the greatest challenge possible when their mother is imprisoned under dubious charges. They have to act as father and mother to their two younger siblings.

movies.title: Alla ricerca di Tadzio
movies.summary: Documentary on Luchino Visconti's travels and auditions in search for a young actor to portray the role of Tadzio in his adaptation of Thomas Mann's novella "Death in Venice", finally choosing Swedish actor Björn Andrésen.
movies.description_full: Documentary on Luchino Visconti's travels and auditions in search for a young actor to portray the role of Tadzio in his adaptation of Thomas Mann's novella "Death in Venice", finally choosing Swedish actor Björn Andrésen.
movies.synopsis: Documentary on Luchino Visconti's travels and auditions in search for a young actor to portray the role of Tadzio in his adaptation of Thomas Mann's novella "Death in Venice", finally choosing Swedish actor Björn Andrésen.

movies.title: Love Means Zero
movies.summary: Nick Bollettieri coached a generation of tennis champions, but his relentless desire to win cost him the relationship he valued most.
movies.description_full: Nick Bollettieri coached a generation of tennis champions, but his relentless desire to win cost him the relationship he valued most.
movies.synopsis: Nick Bollettieri coached a generation of tennis champions, but his relentless desire to win cost him the relationship he valued most.

movies.title: Creature Designers - The Frankenstein Complex
movies.summary: From King Kong to Avatar, from Star Wars to The Lord of the Rings, movie creatures have never been more popular as they are today. Yet the art of creating monsters for the big screen is as old as cinema itself.
movies.description_full: From King Kong to Avatar, from Star Wars to The Lord of the Rings, movie creatures have never been more popular as they are today. Yet the art of creating monsters for the big screen is as old as cinema itself.
movies.synopsis: From King Kong to Avatar, from Star Wars to The Lord of the Rings, movie creatures have never been more popular as they are today. Yet the art of creating monsters for the big screen is as old as cinema itself.

movies.title: The Standard
movies.summary: Goruck's Selection is not only one of the toughest endurance events on the planet, it's also an attempt by its creators to bridge the military-civilian divide. Hosted by a group of Special Forces combat veterans, this 48-hour challenge is a condensed interpretation of the US Army's 24-day Assessment and Selection. For the participants, the event is a chance to test their limits while paying tribute to those who serve. For the Cadre, it's an opportunity to honor their community and connect with civilians. Less than 2% of participants finished the first 18 iterations of the event. Will anyone in Class 019 meet "The Standard?"
